content.query:
select top 100 *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailCustomer.csv'
        , format = 'CSV'
        , parser_version ='2.0'
        , header_row = true
    ) as customers

select state
        , city
        , customercount = count(*) 
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailCustomer.csv'
        , format = 'CSV'
        , parser_version ='2.0'
        , header_row = true
    ) as customers
group by state, city
order by customercount DESC


select top 100 *
  from
    openrowset(
        bulk  'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailTransactionDetails.csv'
        , format = 'CSV'
        , parser_version ='2.0'
        , header_row = true
    ) as orderdetails


select count(*)
  from 
      openrowset(
        bulk  'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailTransactionDetails.csv'
        , format = 'CSV'
        , parser_version ='2.0'
        , header_row = true
    ) as orderdetails
